hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (DOGE/PEPE) Intraday Reversal on Extreme Social Sentiment Divergence
hypothesis_content.statement: For meme coins DOGE and PEPE, when the 4-hour price RSI(14) exceeds 80 (overbought) while the 4-hour social volume growth rate (from tracked sources) turns negative by more than 25%, the price will decline by at least 5% within the next 12 hours with 65% probability, regardless of broader market regime.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coin price action is heavily driven by retail sentiment and social momentum. An extreme overbought condition paired with a sharp drop in social engagement is a leading indicator that the hype-driven buying cohort is exhausted, often preceding a swift liquidation of weak hands. This pattern can be effective even in stress regimes due to the fragile, sentiment-driven nature of these assets.
entry_conditions: Social Volume Growth Rate (4H current vs 4H prior) < -0.25
Enter short at the close of the 4H bar confirming both conditions

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price makes a new 4-hour high above the entry bar

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If the win rate falls below 55% when tested across both DOGE and PEPE in all regimes over 100+ signals, or if the average loss size is more than 1.8x the average win size.
